channel.title: Hello MoparScape I design banners Free
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys the title says it all so if you would like a banner for your server I can make one for you.[/b]
[size=12pt][b]Please Use The Code[/b][/size] Feel free to add more details. [code]Text: Render: Font: Size: Animated: Colours:[/code]
[i]@moderators I will not put their banner on this thread I will pm it to them. If they decide to post it on here it can't be considered my fault.[/i]
